interface.name: template
interface.description:
Template syntax is the same as python's "%" operator, and available template keys are everything in ENVIRONMENT.
example template file: ---------------------- Hello, %(USERNAME)s! Home sweet %(HOME)s. ----------------------
Any undefined keys (i.e unset environment variables) will raise a KeyError and cause the script to fail. If you need to allow for such things, it shouldn't be too hard.
